dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Pq_ATCFuzzyJun'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkPQAtccfuzzy

typeProperties.script:

		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		Leviers as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> contratCadre
source(output(
		{ID contrat (unique)} as string,
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{Liste des POS participants} as string,
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> contrat
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hirarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hirarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Dsignation Statut} as string,
		{Db. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> article
source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livr} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		quantite as string,
		ca as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{Secteur d'activit} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Corrig} as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC livr} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Qt facture} as string,
		{CA factur} as string,
		qt_ecc_enrichi as string,
		ca_ecc_enrichi as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		source_atc as string,
		Successor as string,
		CDis as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		St as string,
		{Dsignation Statut} as string,
		{Deb val} as string,
		N1groupe as string,
		N2groupe as string,
		N3groupe as string,
		N4groupe as string,
		N5groupe as string,
		N6groupe as string,
		N7groupe as string,
		N1groupedesignation as string,
		N2groupedesignation as string,
		N3groupedesignation as string,
		N4groupedesignation as string,
		N5groupedesignation as string,
		N6groupedesignation as string,
		N7groupedesignation as string,
		N1localedesignation as string,
		N2localedesignation as string,
		N3localedesignation as string,
		N4localedesignation as string,
		N5localedesignation as string,
		N6localedesignation as string,
		N7localedesignation as string,
		N1locale as string,
		N2locale as string,
		N3locale as string,
		N4locale as string,
		N5locale as string,
		N6locale as string,
		N7locale as string,
		{Hirarchgroupe} as string,
		{Hirarchlocale} as string,
		{Numro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Nom du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie gnrale} as string,
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie dtaille} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		Client as string,
		{Numro client indirect} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		ATC as string,
		canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numro interne 2} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Groupe cible/Typologie gnrale} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie dtaille} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Compte principal: Numro du compte} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> baseCommerciale
source(output(
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		{ID Seuil} as string,
		{Objectif (avec rgles de validation)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> templateContrat
source(output(
		{ID levier} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		{Code produits exclus} as string,
		{Famille produit} as string,
		{Famille produit exclus} as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Date de dbut} as string,
		{Date de fin} as string,
		{Type de seuil} as string,
		{Contrepartie seuil} as string,
		{ID seuil} as string,
		Marque as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> calculRem
contratCadre, contrat join(contratCadre@{ID contrat cadre} == contrat@{ID contrat cadre},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinContrat
joinContrat select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre} = contratCadre@{ID contrat cadre},
		Leviers,
		{ID contrat} = {ID contrat (unique)},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniqueColumnContrat
uniqueColumnContrat, calculRem join(Leviers == {ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerContratLevier
innerContratLevier select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		{ID levier},
		code_produit = {Code produit},
		{Code produits exclus},
		famille_produit = {Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniqueColumnLevier
uniqueColumnLevier derive(Canal = replace(Canal, "<> ", "")) ~> canal
canal aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier}),
	{Liste des POS participants} = max({Liste des POS participants}),
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)} = max({Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)}),
		code_produit = max(code_produit),
		{Code produits exclus} = max({Code produits exclus}),
		{Famille produit} = max(famille_produit),
		{Famille produit exclus} = max({Famille produit exclus}),
		Canal = max(Canal),
		{Date de dbut} = max({Date de dbut}),
		{Date de fin} = max({Date de fin}),
		{Type de seuil} = max({Type de seuil}),
		{ID seuil} = max({ID seuil}),
		Marque = max(Marque)) ~> uniqueIDContrat
getArticleList derive(code_produit = split(code_produit, ";"),
		{Code produits exclus} = split({Code produits exclus}, ";")) ~> codeProduitToList
Select1 foldDown(unroll(code_produit),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		Code_produits_exclus,
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCodeProduit
name aggregate(groupBy(name),
	article_list = collect(Article)) ~> articleToLIst
article aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Hirarch.locale}),
	count = count(Article)) ~> uniqueReferenceArticle
uniqueReferenceArticle derive(name = "tous") ~> name
uniqueIDContrat, articleToLIst join(lower(code_produit) == lower(name),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> getArticleList
codeProduitToList derive(code_produit = iif(lower(code_produit[1])=="tous", article_list, code_produit)) ~> newCodeProduit
newCodeProduit select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		Code_produits_exclus = {Code produits exclus},
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		name,
		code_produit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FlattenCodeProduit foldDown(unroll(Code_produits_exclus),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus} = Code_produits_exclus,
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCodeProduitExclu
FlattenCodeProduitExclu derive(ToDelete = iif(code_produit=={Code produits exclus}, 1, 0)) ~> toDeleteCode
toDeleteCode filter(ToDelete!=1) ~> deleteCodeProduitExclu
deleteCodeProduitExclu, uniqueReferenceArticle join(code_produit == Article,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> getHierarchieLocale
getHierarchieLocale derive(Famille_produit = split({Famille produit}, ";"),
		Famille_produit_exclus = split({Famille produit exclus}, ";")) ~> familleProduitToList
familleProduitToList foldDown(unroll(Famille_produit),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamille
FlattenFamille foldDown(unroll(Famille_produit_exclus),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamilleExclu
FlattenFamilleExclu filter(lower(Famille_produit)=="toutes") ~> touteFamille
touteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring({Hirarch.locale},1,length(Famille_produit_exclus))==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> touteFamilleToDelete
touteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> Filter1
FlattenFamilleExclu filter(lower(Famille_produit)!="toutes") ~> pasTouteFamille
pasTouteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring({Hirarch.locale},1,length(Famille_produit))!=Famille_produit || Famille_produit==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> pasTouteFamilleToDelete
pasTouteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> Filter2
Filter1, Filter2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(Canal = split(Canal, ";"),
		Liste_des_POS_participants = split({Liste des POS participants}, ";")) ~> canalToList
canalToList foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Liste_des_POS_participants),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants} = Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenPOS
FlattenPOS, baseColumnChoice join(code_produit == {code produit},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerBaseCommerciale
innerBaseCommerciale select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		locale = {Hirarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus,
		year,
		{Code client livr},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
baseCommerciale select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{Code client livr},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> baseColumnChoice
columnChoice derive(ToDelete = iif({Liste des POS participants}=="" || {Liste des POS participants}=={Code client livr}, 0, 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreListePOS
filtreListePOS derive(ToDelete = iif(Canal=={nom du canal}, 1, 0)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreCanal
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")>0) ~> CA
CA aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	ca = sum(toDouble(ca)),
		{Ralis} = sum(toDouble(ca))) ~> Aggregate1
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")==0) ~> quantite
quantite aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	{Somme quantit} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{Ralis} = sum(toInteger(quantite))) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate1, Aggregate2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Article as string,
		NoCanalDist as string,
		NoArt as string,
		NoNiv1 as string,
		NoNiv2 as string,
		NoNiv3 as string,
		NoNiv4 as string,
		NoNiv5 as string,
		NoNiv6 as string,
		NoNiv7 as string,
		Niv1 as string,
		Niv2 as string,
		Niv3 as string,
		Niv4 as string,
		Niv6 as string,
		Niv7 as string,
		CanalDist as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['CALCUL_REMUNERATION.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output

source(output(
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		Leviers as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> contratCadre
source(output(
		{ID contrat (unique)} as string,
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{Liste des POS participants} as string,
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> contrat
source(output(
		{ID levier} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		{Code produits exclus} as string,
		{Famille produit} as string,
		{Famille produit exclus} as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Date de dbut} as string,
		{Date de fin} as string,
		{Type de seuil} as string,
		{ID seuil} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Seuil min} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> levier
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hirarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hirarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Dsignation Statut} as string,
		{Db. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,

source(output(
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		{ID Seuil} as string,
		{Objectif (avec rgles de validation)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> templateContrat
source(output(
		{ID levier} as string,
		{Code produit} as string,
		{Code produits exclus} as string,
		{Famille produit} as string,
		{Famille produit exclus} as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Date de dbut} as string,
		{Date de fin} as string,
		{Type de seuil} as string,
		{Contrepartie seuil} as string,
		{ID seuil} as string,
		Marque as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> calculRem
contratCadre, contrat join(contratCadre@{ID contrat cadre} == contrat@{ID contrat cadre},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinContrat
joinContrat select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre} = contratCadre@{ID contrat cadre},
		Leviers,
		{ID contrat} = {ID contrat (unique)},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniqueColumnContrat
uniqueColumnContrat, levier join(Leviers == {ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerContratLevier
innerContratLevier select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		{ID levier},
		code_produit = {Code produit},
		{Code produits exclus},
		famille_produit = {Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniqueColumnLevier
uniqueColumnLevier derive(Canal = replace(Canal, "<> ", "")) ~> canal
canal aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier}),
	{Liste des POS participants} = max({Liste des POS participants}),
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)} = max({Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)}),
		code_produit = max(code_produit),
		{Code produits exclus} = max({Code produits exclus}),
		{Famille produit} = max(famille_produit),
		{Famille produit exclus} = max({Famille produit exclus}),
		Canal = max(Canal),
		{Date de dbut} = max({Date de dbut}),
		{Date de fin} = max({Date de fin}),
		{Type de seuil} = max({Type de seuil}),
		{ID seuil} = max({ID seuil}),
		Marque = max(Marque)) ~> uniqueIDContrat
getArticleList derive(code_produit = split(code_produit, ";"),
		{Code produits exclus} = split({Code produits exclus}, ";")) ~> codeProduitToList
Select1 foldDown(unroll(code_produit),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		Code_produits_exclus,
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCodeProduit
name aggregate(groupBy(name),
	article_list = collect(Article)) ~> articleToLIst
article aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Hirarch.locale}),
	count = count(Article)) ~> uniqueReferenceArticle
uniqueReferenceArticle derive(name = "tous") ~> name
uniqueIDContrat, articleToLIst join(lower(code_produit) == lower(name),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> getArticleList
codeProduitToList derive(code_produit = iif(lower(code_produit[1])=="tous", article_list, code_produit)) ~> newCodeProduit
newCodeProduit select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		Code_produits_exclus = {Code produits exclus},
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		name,
		code_produit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FlattenCodeProduit foldDown(unroll(Code_produits_exclus),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus} = Code_produits_exclus,
		{Famille produit},
		{Famille produit exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCodeProduitExclu
FlattenCodeProduitExclu derive(ToDelete = iif(code_produit=={Code produits exclus}, 1, 0)) ~> toDeleteCode
toDeleteCode filter(ToDelete!=1) ~> deleteCodeProduitExclu
deleteCodeProduitExclu, uniqueReferenceArticle join(code_produit == Article,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> getHierarchieLocale
getHierarchieLocale derive(Famille_produit = split({Famille produit}, ";"),
		Famille_produit_exclus = split({Famille produit exclus}, ";")) ~> familleProduitToList
familleProduitToList foldDown(unroll(Famille_produit),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamille
FlattenFamille foldDown(unroll(Famille_produit_exclus),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenFamilleExclu
FlattenFamilleExclu filter(lower(Famille_produit)=="toutes") ~> touteFamille
touteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring({Hirarch.locale},1,length(Famille_produit_exclus))==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> touteFamilleToDelete
touteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> Filter1
FlattenFamilleExclu filter(lower(Famille_produit)!="toutes") ~> pasTouteFamille
pasTouteFamille derive(ToDelete = iif(substring({Hirarch.locale},1,length(Famille_produit))!=Famille_produit || Famille_produit==Famille_produit_exclus,1,0)) ~> pasTouteFamilleToDelete
pasTouteFamilleToDelete filter(ToDelete==0) ~> Filter2
Filter1, Filter2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(Canal = split(Canal, ";"),
		Liste_des_POS_participants = split({Liste des POS participants}, ";")) ~> canalToList
canalToList foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Liste_des_POS_participants),
	mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants} = Liste_des_POS_participants,
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		{Hirarch.locale},
		count,
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenPOS
FlattenPOS, baseColumnChoice join(code_produit == {code produit},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerBaseCommerciale
innerBaseCommerciale select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		{Liste des POS participants},
		{Liste des ATC rfrents du contrat (pour la visualisation)},
		code_produit,
		{Code produits exclus},
		Canal,
		{Date de dbut},
		{Date de fin},
		{Type de seuil},
		{ID seuil},
		Marque,
		ToDelete,
		Article,
		locale = {Hirarch.locale},
		Famille_produit,
		Famille_produit_exclus,
		year,
		{Code client livr},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
baseCommerciale select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{Code client livr},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{nom du canal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> baseColumnChoice
columnChoice derive(ToDelete = iif({Liste des POS participants}=="" || {Liste des POS participants}=={Code client livr}, 0, 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreListePOS
filtreListePOS derive(ToDelete = iif(Canal=={nom du canal}, 1, 0)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 filter(ToDelete==0) ~> filtreCanal
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")>0) ~> CA
CA aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	ca = sum(toDouble(ca)),
		{Ralis} = sum(toDouble(ca))) ~> Aggregate1
filtreCanal filter(instr(lower({Type de seuil}),"ca")==0) ~> quantite
quantite aggregate(groupBy({ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier},
		year),
	{Somme quantit} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{Ralis} = sum(toInteger(quantite))) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate1, Aggregate2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union2, templateContrat join(Union2@{ID contrat cadre} == templateContrat@{ID contrat cadre}
	&& Union2@{ID contrat} == templateContrat@{ID contrat}
	&& Union2@{ID levier} == templateContrat@{ID levier},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerTemplateContrat
innerTemplateContrat select(mapColumn(
		{ID contrat cadre} = Union2@{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat} = Union2@{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = Union2@{ID levier},
		year,
		ca,
		{Ralis},
		{Somme quantit},
		{ID Seuil},
		{Objectif (avec rgles de validation)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 filter({Ralis}>=toDouble({Objectif (avec rgles de validation)})) ~> Filter3
Filter3 aggregate(groupBy(year,
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier}),
	{Max ID Seuil} = max(toInteger({ID Seuil}))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3, calculRem join(Aggregate3@{ID levier} == calculRem@{ID levier}
	&& toInteger({Max ID Seuil}) == toInteger({ID seuil}),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerTemplateRemuneration
innerTemplateRemuneration select(mapColumn(
		year,
		{ID contrat cadre},
		{ID contrat},
		{ID levier} = Aggregate3@{ID levier},
		{Max ID Seuil},
		{Contrepartie seuil}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Article as string,
		NoCanalDist as string,
		NoArt as string,
		NoNiv1 as string,
		NoNiv2 as string,
		NoNiv3 as string,
		NoNiv4 as string,
		NoNiv5 as string,
		NoNiv6 as string,
		NoNiv7 as string,
		Niv1 as string,
		Niv2 as string,
		Niv3 as string,
		Niv4 as string,
		Niv6 as string,
		Niv7 as string,
		CanalDist as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['CALCUL_SEUIL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output

source(output(
		{Code postal} as string,

		qte_ecoulement as string,

source(output(

		{Hirarch.groupe} as string,

	),

	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> articlehierarchi

		{Code postal} as string,
		{Org# commerciale} as short,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Dure_priode} as string,
		{Priode} as string,
		{Mois dbut} as string,

	),

unionEccoulement derive(marque_id = iif (  instr(lower({marque_file}) , "saunier") >0  , 1604 , 1621 )) ~> DerivedColumn1
articlehierarchi select(mapColumn(
		marque = OrgCm,
		reference = Article,
		CDis
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(marque,
		reference),
	CDis = max(CDis)) ~> articlDropdupl
DerivedColumn1, articlDropdupl join(unionEccoulement@reference == articlDropdupl@reference
	&& toString(marque_id) == marque,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select3, unionsapehs join(POSSAMidString == toString(Client)
	&& toInteger(marque_id) == {Org# commerciale},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		Ecc_Code_postal = Select3@{Code postal},

		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,
		marque,
		Client,
		{Sap_Code postal} = unionsapehs@{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference = unionEccoulement@reference,
		{Code postal},
		distributeur,
		marque_file,
		agence_code,
		marque_id,

	&& toInteger(Select2@month) == toInteger(Aggregate1@month)
	&& toInteger(year) == toInteger(annee1)
	&& toInteger(reference) == toInteger(Article),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3

notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pices dtaches pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})>0) ~> pieceDetache
columnFormat filter({Quantit en UV BL}==0) ~> nullQuantity
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pices dtaches pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})==0) ~> notPieceDetache
notPieceDetache derive(month = iif(month_name=="janv", "01", 
    iif(month_name=="fvr","02",
    iif(month_name=="mars", "03", 
    iif(month_name=="avr", "04", 
    iif(month_name=="mai", "05", 
    iif(month_name=="juin", "06", 
    iif(month_name=="juil", "07", 
    iif(month_name=="aot", "08", 
    iif(month_name=="sept", "09", 
    iif(month_name=="oct", "10", 
    iif(month_name=="nov", "11", 
    iif(month_name=="dc", "12", "0"))))))))))))) ~> monthToNumber
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
Aggregate1 filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoinWithOrga
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> leftOuter
ventesDirectes derive({Org. commerciale} = replace({Org. commerciale}, " ", ""),
		{Qt facture} = toDouble({Qt facture}),
		yearmonth = replace(yearmonth, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(Article, " ", "")) ~> Cleansing
Cleansing aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qt facture} = sum({Qt facture})) ~> SumQuantity
SumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article_right = Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qt vente directe} = {Qt facture}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rfrence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerVentesDirecte
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rfrence Article Fournisseur} == Article_right
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftVentesDirectes
InnerVentesDirecte derive({Quantit en UV BL} = {Quantit en UV BL}-{Qt vente directe}) ~> removeQuantityVenteDirecte
removeQuantityVenteDirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Dpartement ID},
		{Quantit en UV BL},
		month_name,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article_right) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerLeft
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Dpartement ID},
		{Quantit en UV BL},
		month_name,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Marque DESC},
		sous_famille = {Sous Famille},
		reference = {Rfrence Article Fournisseur},
		agence_code = {Agence Code},
		departement_id = {Dpartement ID},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantit en UV BL},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
Select1 derive(departement_id = toDouble(''),
		prix_unitaire_std = toDouble(''),
		distributeur = "DSC") ~> Addcolumn
organisation aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		POSSAMidString = first(POSSAMidString),
		HubSAPid = first(HubSAPid),
		BrandID = first(BrandID)) ~> Aggregate1
Addcolumn, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1

source1 derive(month = iif(str_mois=="janvier", "01",     
 iif(str_mois=="fvrier","02",    
  iif(str_mois=="mars", "03",      
  iif(str_mois=="avril", "04",      
  iif(str_mois=="mai", "05",      
  iif(str_mois=="juin", "06",      
  iif(str_mois=="juillet", "07",      
  iif(str_mois=="Aot", "08",      
  iif(str_mois=="Septembre", "09",      
  iif(str_mois=="Octobre", "10",      
  iif(str_mois=="Novembre", "11",      
  iif(str_mois=="Dcembre", "12", "0"))))))))))))) ~> ConvertMonth
ConvertMonth derive(yearmonth = year+month) ~> ExtractMonthYear
ExtractMonthYear filter(!isNull(CIA)) ~> FiltrerCIA
OrganisationEHS filter(!isNull({CP Coop.})) ~> FiltreCPCoop
FiltreCPCoop aggregate(groupBy({CP Coop.},
		HubSAPid),
	{Nom Cooprative} = max({Nom Cooprative}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		Dept = max(Dept),
		{Code Postal} = max({Code Postal})) ~> UniqueCpCoopHubsApid
FiltrerCIA, UniqueCpCoopHubsApid join(CIA == {CP Coop.},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoinCIACPCoop
FiltrerCIA, UniqueCpCoopHubsApid join(CIA == {CP Coop.},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLeftCIACPCoop
InnerJoinCIACPCoop, Rename join({Rfrence Article} == Article
	&& ExtractMonthYear@yearmonth == Rename@yearmonth
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinVenteDirect
JoinVenteDirect derive({Quantites livres} = toDouble({Quantites livres}) - coalesce(toDouble({Qt vente directe}) , 0)) ~> QuantiteesLivres
VenteDirecte select(mapColumn(

		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qt vente directe} = {Qt vente directe}
	),

QuantiteesLivres derive(reference = replace({Rfrence Article}, 'SDU', '')) ~> Reference

		month,

levierQA pivot(groupBy(year,

levierQA2 pivot(groupBy(year,

levierCA2 pivot(groupBy(year,

	),

Filter2 derive(month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		origin = "ecoulement") ~> ExtractYearAndMonth
ExtractYearAndMonth filter(not({Qt Mois A}=='0')) ~> FiltreQteMois
ExtractYearAndMonth filter({Qt Mois A}=='0') ~> FiltreQteMoisANull
FiltreQteMois filter({Ref fournisseur}!='') ~> FiltreRefFournisseur
FiltreRefFournisseur derive({Agence du client} = replace(replace({Agence du client}, " ", ""), "ETS", ""),
		{Qt Mois A} = toDouble({Qt Mois A})) ~> caEcoulementAndAgenceClient
caEcoulementAndAgenceClient filter({Agence du client} != '') ~> FiltreAgenceClient
OrganisationMabilleSonac derive(POSid = replace( replace({POSid}, " ", ""),'ETS','' )) ~> POSid
POSid filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> FiltrePOSid
FiltrePOSid aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID),
		Commentaire = max(Commentaire)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
FiltreAgenceClient, uniqueOrganisation join({Agence du client} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
FiltreAgenceClient, uniqueOrganisation join({Agence du client} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOuterOrganisation
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(MabilleSaunierDuvale@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& {Code article} == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive({Qt Mois A} = toDouble({Qt Mois A})-toDouble({Qt vente directe})) ~> substractVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, endVenteDirect join(MabilleSaunierDuvale@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& {Code article} == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(torigin)) ~> leftOuterVentesDirectes
Select2, Select3 union(byName: true)~> Union1

		{Valeur n-1} as string,
		{CP Dpt} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Agence (Code)} as string,
		{CP Agence} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig} as string,
		{ATC Corrig} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Anne civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qt cde} as string,
		{CA cd} as string,
		{Qt livre} as string,
		{CA livr} as string,
		{Qt facture} as string,
		{CA factur} as string,
		{Cout standard cd} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr} as string,
		{Cout standard factur} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
ecoulement filter(!isNull({Quantit})) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull derive({Quantit} = toDouble({Quantit})) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement derive(Year = split(Mois, "/")[2],
		Month = split(Mois, "/")[1]) ~> getYear
getYear derive(Yearmonth = concat(Year, Month)) ~> yearMonth
yearMonth filter(!isNull({Dpot})) ~> depotNotNull
organisation derive({Nom Agence (Code)} = trim({Nom Agence (Code)}, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim({HubSAPid}, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> notNull
notNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Agence (Code)},
		HubSAPid),
	{CP Agence} = max({CP Agence}),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		BrandID = max(BrandID)) ~> uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dpot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
depotNotNull, uniqueAgenceAndHubsapID join({Dpot} == {Nom Agence (Code)},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Agence (Code)})) ~> outerleftOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qt facture} = toDouble({Qt facture}),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " "),
		Article = trim(Article, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qt facture} = sum({Qt facture})) ~> sumQuantity
DerivedColumn1, typeCaste join(DerivedColumn1@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& {Rfrence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
Rename derive(yearmonth = toString(yearmonth),
		Article = toString(Article),
		{Code client} = toString({Code client})) ~> typeCaste
DerivedColumn1, typeCaste join(DerivedColumn1@Yearmonth == typeCaste@yearmonth
	&& {Rfrence} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(typeCaste@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive({Quantit} = {Quantit}-{Qt ventes directes}) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
sumQuantity select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qt ventes directes} = {Qt facture}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(marque_file = iif(toInteger(BrandID)==1604, "saunier", "vaillant"),
		{Socit} = upper({Socit})) ~> marqueFile
marqueFile select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = {Socit},
		reference = {Rfrence},
		article = {Dsignation},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantit},
		ca_ecoulement = Valeur,
		{Code postal} = {CP Dpt},
		year = Year,
		month = Month,
		yearmonth = Union1@Yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		marque_file
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
innerOrganisation derive(Yearmonth = replace(Yearmonth, " ", "")) ~> DerivedColumn1
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique0} as string,
		{SaunierDuvalNicolas HERNANDEZ0100001999Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique1} as string,
		SaunierDuval as string,
		{01000} as string,
		{01999} as string,
		{nicolas hernandez} as string,
		{Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique} as string,
		{01} as string,
		{1647-Rhne-Alpes Auvergne} as string,
		{16400092} as string,
		{nicolas julien} as string,
		{SD diffus} as string,
		{NICOLAS Julien} as string,
		{16566798} as string,
		Prop_14 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
outerleftOrganisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MAILLARD_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound

		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
getYearmonth derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="fvrier","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="aot", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="dcembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
monthToNumber filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Cooprative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Cooprative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Cooprative},
		HubSAPid),
	POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid)) ~> unique
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Cooprative} == {Nom Cooprative},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Cooprative} == {Nom Cooprative},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Cooprative})) ~> leftOuter
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonth@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& REFFOURNISSEUR == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt vente directe})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonth@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& REFFOURNISSEUR == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
enleverVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		Fournisseur = marque_file,
		{Cooprative},

		{Dsignation},

outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(

	),

typeCaste select(mapColumn(

source(output(
		{Anne} as string,
		Documentation as string,
		Marque as string,
		Cible as string,
		{Primtre} as string,
		Levier as string,
		Canal as string,
		{Hirarchie inclues} as string,
		{Hirarchies exclues} as string,
		Type as string,
		{Valeur Annuelle} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> levierPerformance
RecordID derive({diffus/chantier} = trim(split(Cible, " ")[2], " "),
		ID_KPI = "Sum_XRow_"+toString(RecordID),
		{Libell levi} = Levier+"-"+Documentation+" "+Cible+" "+iif({Valeur Annuelle}=="YES", "Annuel", "Mensuel")) ~> newColumn
uniqueLevier keyGenerate(output(RecordID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> RecordID
newColumn select(mapColumn(
		{Anne},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Primtre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie = {Hirarchie inclues},
		Type,
		{Libell levi},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
levierPerformance filter({Anne}=="2020") ~> YEARFILTER
Select3 derive(Marque = split(Marque, "."),
		Canal = split(Canal, ","),
		Hierarchie = split(Hierarchie, ",")) ~> splitting
FlattenCanal foldDown(unroll(Hierarchie),
	mapColumn(
		{Anne},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Primtre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libell levi},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenHierarchie
splitting foldDown(unroll(Marque),
	mapColumn(
		{Anne},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Primtre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libell levi},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenMarque
FlattenMarque foldDown(unroll(Canal),
	mapColumn(
		{Anne},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Primtre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		Hierarchie,
		Type,
		{Libell levi},
		{diffus/chantier},
		ID_KPI,
		{Valeur Annuelle}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenCanal
FlattenHierarchie filter(length(Hierarchie)==3) ~> lenHierarchie3
Select4, lenHierarchie3 join({Num Org} == Marque
	&& {Canal Dist} == Canal
	&& {Nom Canal} == {diffus/chantier}
	&& {Art Niv 2} == Hierarchie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerLevier
innerLevier filter(Type=="CA") ~> levierCA
levierCA pivot(groupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		Mois,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(ca_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
innerLevier filter(Type=="Quantit") ~> levierQA
levierQA pivot(groupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		Mois,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(qt_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot2
Pivot1, Pivot2 union(byName: true)~> Union2
FlattenHierarchie filter(length(Hierarchie)!=3) ~> lenHierarchieNot3
Select4, lenHierarchieNot3 join({Num Org} == Marque
	&& {Canal Dist} == Canal
	&& {Nom Canal} == {diffus/chantier}
	&& {Art Niv 1} == Hierarchie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerLevier2
innerLevier2 filter(Type=="Quantit") ~> levierQA2
levierQA2 pivot(groupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		Mois,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(qt_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot3
innerLevier2 filter(Type=="CA") ~> levierCA2
levierCA2 pivot(groupBy({Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5},
		Mois,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	pivotBy(ID_KPI),
	{} = sum(toDouble(ca_final)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot4
Pivot3, Pivot4 union(byName: true)~> Union3
Union2, Union3 union(byName: true)~> Union4

dataCleansing select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org},
		{Num DR},
		{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2},

		qt_final,

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

quantityToLine derive(Mois = toInteger(split(columnName, " ")[3]),
		qt_final = toDouble(qt_final)) ~> getQuantityMonth
CAtoLine derive(Mois = toInteger(split(columnName, " ")[3]),
		ca_final = toDouble(ca_final)) ~> getCAMonth
getQuantityMonth, getCAMonth join(quantityToLine@{Num Org} == CAtoLine@{Num Org}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num DR} == CAtoLine@{Num DR}
	&& quantityToLine@{Num ATC} == CAtoLine@{Num ATC}
	&& quantityToLine@{Canal Dist} == CAtoLine@{Canal Dist}
	&& quantityToLine@{Nom Canal} == CAtoLine@{Nom Canal}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 1}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 2}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 3}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 4}
	&& quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5} == CAtoLine@{Art Niv 5}
	&& getQuantityMonth@Mois == getCAMonth@Mois,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinQuantityAndCA
objectif derive({Art Niv 1} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 1}), " ", {Art Niv 1}),
		{Art Niv 2} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 2}), " ", {Art Niv 2}),
		{Art Niv 3} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 3}), " ", {Art Niv 3}),
		{Art Niv 4} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 4}), " ", {Art Niv 4}),
		{Art Niv 5} = iif(isNull({Art Niv 5}), " ", {Art Niv 5})) ~> changeNULL
joinQuantityAndCA select(mapColumn(
		{Num Org} = quantityToLine@{Num Org},
		{Num DR} = quantityToLine@{Num DR},
		{Num ATC} = quantityToLine@{Num ATC},
		{Canal Dist} = quantityToLine@{Canal Dist},
		{Nom Canal} = quantityToLine@{Nom Canal},
		{Art Niv 1} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 1},
		{Art Niv 2} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 2},
		{Art Niv 3} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 3},
		{Art Niv 4} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 4},
		{Art Niv 5} = quantityToLine@{Art Niv 5},
		{Qt Obj An} = quantityToLine@{Qt Obj An},
		{CA Obj An} = quantityToLine@{CA Obj An},
		qt_final,
		Mois = getQuantityMonth@Mois,
		ca_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteRightColumn
deleteRightColumn derive({Num Org} = trim({Num Org}, " "),
		{Canal Dist} = trim({Canal Dist}, " "),
		{Nom Canal} = trim(lower({Nom Canal}), " "),
		{Art Niv 1} = trim({Art Niv 1}, " "),
		{Art Niv 2} = trim({Art Niv 2}, " ")) ~> dataCleansing
libelleLevier aggregate(groupBy({Anne},
		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Primtre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		{Hirarchie inclues},
		{Hirarchies exclues},
		Type,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	{Libell levi} = max({Libell levi})) ~> uniqueLevier
YEARFILTER derive({Libell levi} = Levier+"-"+Documentation+" "+Cible+" "+{Primtre}+" "+iif({Valeur Annuelle}=="YES", "Annuel", "Mensuel")) ~> libelleLevier

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		Article as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Dure_priode} as string,
		{Priode} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixmoyen
DerivedColumn3 derive(mois1 = toInteger(split( {Mois dbut}, "/")[1]),
		annee1 = split( {Mois dbut}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil ngoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(toreplicate = iif (mois2 - mois1 <=0, 1 ,  mois2 - mois1+1)) ~> DerivedColumn2
prixmoyen derive({Mois dbut} = split( {Dure_priode} ,"-")[1],
		{Mois fin} = split( {Dure_priode} ,"-")[2],
		WholeSalerID = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn2 derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index )) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Distributeur,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Dure_priode},
		{Priode},
		{Mois dbut},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Dure_priode},
		{Priode},
		{Mois dbut},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn5
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['prixmoyensplit.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> prixsplit

		{Document de vente} as integer,
		Poste as integer,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig} as string,
		{ATC Corrig} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as integer,
		{Rcept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as integer,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as double,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Anne civile} as integer,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qt cde} as float,
		{CA cd} as float,
		{Qt livre} as float,
		{CA livr} as float,
		{Qt facture} as float,
		{CA factur} as float,
		{Cout standard cd} as float,
		{Cout fabrication} as float,
		{Cout standard livr} as float,
		{Cout standard factur} as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Rcept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Anne civile},
		{Qt facture},
		{CA factur},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Anne civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
Select3 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> newID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA factur}/{Qt facture}) ~> prixUnitaire
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Anne civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qt facture} = max({Qt facture}),
		{CA factur} = max({CA factur})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Anne civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
newID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Anne civile} = {Anne civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Anne civile} = {Anne civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de priode} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de priode}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
changementDePeriodeFiltre derive({Dure_priode} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Anne civile}=={previous Anne civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Anne civile}=={next Anne civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Anne civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Anne civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Anne civile})+"-12/"+toString({Anne civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Anne civile}=={next Anne civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Anne civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Anne civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Anne civile})+"-12/"+toString({Anne civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
facturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Anne civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Anne civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Dure_priode}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Anne civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Dure_priode})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Rcept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Anne civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA factur}/{Qt facture})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive({Dure_priode} = "1/"+toString({Anne civile})+"-12/"+toString({Anne civile}),
		join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(DerivedColumn1@join == DerivedColumn2@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Dure_priode},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Dure_priode}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6 derive({Priode} = 1) ~> addperiod
Select7, addperiod union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
facturation derive(test = toString({CA factur})) ~> DerivedColumn3
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_PRIX_PAR_PERIODE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

source(output(

		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
rename derive(yearmonth = replace(split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[1], "-", ""),
		canal = split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[2],
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonthANDcanal
yearmonthANDcanal derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> yearANDmonth
yearANDmonth filter(!isNull(agence_code)) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIDNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
posIDNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt vente directe})) ~> deleteVentesDirectes
ECOULEMENT select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code = agence,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file = frs,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ref_frs,
		qte_ecoulement = {qte (m) n},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(Article) || isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
deleteVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,

		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
marquename select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = societe,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,

		County,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID
	),

Union1 derive(marque_name = "SaunierDuval",
		marque = "1604",
		marque_num = "1604") ~> marquename

ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,

	),

avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Anne},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
Select1 derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement ))) ~> EccAddToReplicate
DerivedColumn1 split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Anne}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Anne}+"0"+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select2, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Anne},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 filter(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0) ~> positiveQuantite
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		rcount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 window(over(yearmonth,
		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn6
Flatten3 window(over(yearmonth,
		Agence,
		NoArtVGF),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
DerivedColumn6 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,

		{Anne},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Window3 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+Agence+NoArtVGF+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_avoir = iif(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn7
Window2 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn8
Window1 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+agence_code+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn9

		Facture as string,

		ca_livr_ as string,

		ca_factur_ as string,

		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
Select1 derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 5),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 6 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Reprsentant} = toString(byName('Reprsentant')),
		{N Dpartement} = toString(byName('N Dpartement')),
		{Dpartement} = toString(byName('Dpartement')),
		{Libell point de vente} = toString(byName('Libell point de vente')),
		{N Siret} = toString(byName('N Siret')),
		{Anne livraison} = toString(byName('Anne livraison')),
		{Rference} = toString(byName('Rference')),
		{Qte en unit de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unit de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Reprsentant},
		{N Dpartement},
		{Dpartement},
		{Libell point de vente},
		{N Siret},
		{Anne livraison},
		{Rference},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qte en unit de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes derive({Code client} = trim({Code client}, " "),
		{Qt facture} = toDouble({Qt facture}),
		yearmonth = trim(yearmonth, " ")) ~> cleansingVentesDirectes
cleansingVentesDirectes aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qt facture} = sum({Qt facture})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qt ventes directes} = {Qt facture}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& {Rference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-{Qt ventes directes}) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Reprsentant},
		departement_id = {N Dpartement},
		reference = {Rference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared afctationflows = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_affectation_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared atcc2021 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_c2021_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = afctationflows,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"Cl Rfrentiel", "Marque", "Code Postal dbut", "Code Postal fin", "Utilisateur", "Fonction", "Dpartement", "DR"})
in
  #"Choose columns";

source(output(
		{Cl Rfrentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Cl EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal dbut} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Dpartement} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Lancement Maj Affectation} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refaffectation
source(output(
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ref2021
Select2 derive(Utilisateur = lower(Utilisateur)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 derive(NomATC = lower(NomATC)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Cl Rfrentiel},
		{Recherche Cl EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal dbut},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Dpartement},
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		DR,
		{Secteur prime},
		Matricule,
		{Secteur DEC},
		Rallye
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ref2021 filter(!isNull(NomATC)) ~> Filter1
filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation derive({Plan prime} = iif( Fonction== "Attach commercial rseau" || Fonction == "Attach commercial rseau 2" , "Diffus", iif( Fonction == "Attach commercial prescription"  , "Chantier", ""  )  )) ~> DerivedColumn3
refaffectation select(mapColumn(
		{Cl Rfrentiel},
		{Recherche Cl EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal dbut},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Dpartement},
		DR,
		{ID SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['atc_affectation_lower'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> atcAffectationLower
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['atc_c2021_lower'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> atcC2021Lower

	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
